description:
In trunk, the nova compute api supports onset_files to allow users to specify files that are added to an instance on creation. The openstack api does not currently implement this behavior, despite it being in the 1.0 spec.

Additionally, file size limits and limits on the number of files need to be supported for this bug to be fixed.
title: OS API does not support personality during instance creation
